Detailed Description

Wrapper for libtecla, a command-line editor library.

This only includes basic functionality, could later be extended to handle completion, etc.

Readline::Readline (  const char *  prompt,
bool  history,
const char *  histFile
) 
 

Initializes the library.

Parameters:
prompt Pointer to string to use as prompt
history Set to true if you want history, false if you don't
histFile Set to a filename if you want the history saved/reused, NULL otherwise.
